description:
Kryptor is free and open source file encryption and signing software for Windows, Linux, and macOS.

It's a portable, cross-platform command-line tool that makes use of the latest and greatest cryptographic primitives, with no config options. It aims to be a better version of age and Minisign to provide a leaner, user friendly alternative to GPG.
summary: A simple, modern, and secure encryption and signing tool that aims to be a better version of age and Minisign.
author: Samuel Lucas
